sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare the combined rivanol paste and observe its clinical effect.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备复方利凡诺糊剂，观察临床疗效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method to determine indigo contents in Anti-ulcer paste of traditional Chinese herbs.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立中药溃疡糊剂中靛蓝的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion The antibiotic cataplasm had a good effect on young permanent teeth with periapical periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 结论抗生素糊剂对于年轻恒牙根尖周炎具有良好效果。

sentences.english: Objective The explore of clinical curative efficacy of retinoic acid paste in treatment with oral leukoplakia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨维甲酸糊剂治疗口腔白斑的临床疗效。

sentences.english: A good consistency for the paste is one like honey or toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 稠度较好的糊剂就像是蜂蜜或牙膏。

sentences.english: The MTT assay showed the paste had good biocompatibility.
sentences.chinese: MTT评价结果表明该糊剂具有良好的生物相容性。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effects of Benzocaine Paste on treating oral ulcers.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究临床应用苯佐卡因糊剂治疗口腔溃疡的疗效。

sentences.english: The antibacterial effect of the aqueous extract of Chinese gallnut on anaerobic strains in the root canals was proved.
sentences.chinese: 本实验证实了五倍子糊剂在感染根管内的抑菌效果。

sentences.english: This article reports 30 cases of root canal filling with calcium hydroxide and iodoform paste.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道应用氢氧化钙蒸馏水糊剂作根管充填30例。

sentences.english: The consistency of the paste then prevents segregation errors.
sentences.chinese: 糊剂的稠度可以预防分离错误。
